transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello Ali sir good morning Anju bol rahi thi India Mart se.

Customer: Ali sir aap se baat karni hai catalog ko lekar thoda sa time nikaliye sir baat nahi ho pa rahi aap se.

Customer: Aap to aap to shuru kar diya na kaam sir?

Customer: Nahi to kaam shuru kiya hai police ne.

Executive: Awaaz sahi nahi aa rahi sir aapki kya keh rahe hain?

Customer: Busy pura hai na madam kaam bahut hai.

Executive: Sir dekho ye to hona hi hai sir matlab itne time ke baad aapne dobara se kaam shuru kiya hai online offline dono taraf hi kaam ka pressure jyada rahega ek bar thoda sa ye bhi to manage karna hai na sir almost ye bhi aapke saat aath saat aath mahine sir nikal gaye aise hi to abhi tak use nahi kar paye hain business nahi le paye hain to sir at least ab to shuru kijiye aur jyada time to main bol hi nahi dena hota hai aap 10-15 minute dijiye daily ki do teen buylead consume kijiye taki results milna shuru ho aapko follow ups banenge tabhi to closures milenge sir.

Customer: Haan ji haan ji madam call karenge aap aapko call karenge.

Executive: Sirf call karne se dekho baat nahi banegi aapko kuch cheeze hain jo main guide karna chah rahi hu main batana chah rahi hu sahi direction mein kaam karenge to results jaldi milenge sir to at least mere se thoda properly baat kijiye iske bare mein abhi aap available hai video meeting join kar sakte hain kya sir ek bar paanch minute ke liye?

Customer: Nahi madam abhi nahi ho payega.

Executive: Bahar hai kya sir abhi?

Customer: Haan haan wo thoda kaam chal raha hai photo dalna hai na.

Executive: Aap available kitne baje tak ho jayenge?

Customer: Thodi der tak ke 12 baje tak madam market mein agar aaya to hum sir mein rehta hai matlab do teen ghante se koi aur.

Executive: Sir baat samajh nahi aa pa rahi awaaz bilkul clear nahi aa rahi aapki main bas thoda sa mujhe time confirm kar do sir kitne baje tak aap available ho jaoge?

Customer: Madam jabhi free ho na aap mujhe call kar lena.

Executive: Sir aap to do din se aap ye cheez keh rahe hain main free hote hi aapko call karta hu do din nikal gaye sir baat hi nahi ho pa rahi.

Customer: Time nahi mil raha time madam time ke baad pata hai 6 baje ke baad pata hai time.

Customer: Kab aap free nahi sakte na?

Executive: Sir main maan rahi hu ki busy dekho kaam to pure din chalta rahega bas paanch minute nikal lo abhi ek bar iske bare mein baat kar lete hain paanch minute ke liye mobile se hi chaho to aap join kar lo is video meeting main aapko screen share karke kuch cheeze batana chah rahi hu ek bar.

Executive: Screen main share kar dungi apni join kar sakte hain aap abhi?

Executive: Mobile se hi kar lijiye paanch hi minute lagega paanch se saat minute bas.

Customer: Sir do minute rukiye madam call.

Executive: Haan ji bheju video meeting ka link?

Customer: Haan link bhej do madam main do minute mein call karta hu.

Executive: Chalo theek hai main link share kar rahi hu aap join karo sir ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and unable to dedicate time.

- Customer unable to utilize IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of using buyleads.

- Executive offered a video meeting for guidance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share video meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, time availability
